precedent_violations.context:
ontrol but only 15% economic ownership of the
    reorganized entity. This creates a control disparity of 36%.

    Jane Doe owns 49% voting shares and 85% economic ownership.

    LEGAL ISSUES:

    The plan violates Purdue Pharma L.P. v. United States, 144 S. Ct. 2079 (2024),
    which prohibits non-consensual third-party releases in bankruptcy cases.

    The Trustee lacks authority under 11 U.S.C. § 363(b) to approve this settlement
    without Court approval.

    CLA
